title: Test
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2008/09, slightly decreasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2014/15, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014/15 to 2015/16.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008/09 and 2009/10.
Max Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 42.39 was recorded at Year 2006/07, and 2007/08
Min Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 29.13 was recorded at Year 2010/11
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006/07 to 2010/11.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010/11 to 2012/13.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2012/13 to 2013/14.
